did.unittitle: All World Hebrew Central Organization records
did.abstract: The All World Hebrew Central Organization was a Hebraic organization whose mission was to protect and defend the interests of the Hebrew people. Collection includes correspondence, clippings, and sheet music related to the All World Hebrew Central Organization located in Los Angeles, CA.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The All World Hebrew Central Organization was founded in 1935 in Berlin, Germany, as a political Hebraic organization whose mission was to protect and defend the interests of the Hebrew people anywhere in the world.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of correspondence, clippings, and sheet music related to the All World Hebrew Central Organization located in Los Angeles, CA. Also includes clippings about various musicians.
